Question
========

Marleen wants to investigate whether students who go on vacation more often (measured by the number of days of vacation in the past year) get higher grades (measured by the average exam grade of the past year). She wants to statistically control for intelligence (measured by a standardized IQ test) as a possible confounder of this relationship.

What analysis technique should she use for this? 
Answerlist
----------
* Multiple linear regression analysis without interaction.
* Multiple linear regression analysis with interaction.
* Multiple logistic regression analysis without interaction.
* Multiple logistic regression analysis with interaction.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
